tasks.task: Growing sweet corn using ecological production practices on sandy silt loam soils
subtasks: Planting sweet corn in 20 acres of the 50 acres of vegetables
Applying hairy vetch cover crop to improve soil fertility
Seeding hairy vetch at 15-30 pounds per acre, depending on seed cost
Inoculating vetch seed to ensure nitrogen fixation
Managing vetch stand to maximize nitrogen release before turning under
Tilling under the vetch cover crop around the second to third week of May
Monitoring for soil structure improvement, nitrogen enrichment, and erosion protection
Rotating crops with sweet corn, pumpkins, and green beans
